column2: Revoke physical access (keys/badges) and digital access (network/email) immediately.
Since physical return is impossible, require written confirmation of data deletion from personal devices.
Remind departing employee of ongoing confidentiality duties (Trade Secrets/IP).
Must follow statutory schedules for reviews, disciplinary records, medical info to comply with laws/e-discovery.
Applies to background/credit reports in former employee files. Requires 'reasonable measures' to destroy (burn/shred/erase).
No federal requirement to provide references.
Some states require providing a reference letter upon request.
Must state: 1. Length of employment. 2. Job classification. 3. Pay rate.
Liability for making false, damaging statements about a former employee (libel/slander).
Legal protection for employers giving honest references without malice.
Common practice to mitigate defamation risk. Confirm ONLY: Dates of employment and Job Title.
